Uses of Class
io.microraft.exception.RaftException

  • Packages that use RaftException 
    Package Description
    io.microraft.exception  
    io.microraft.impl  

    • Uses of RaftException in io.microraft.exception

      Subclasses of RaftException in io.microraft.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CannotReplicateException
      Thrown when an operation cannot be temporarily replicated.
      class  IndeterminateStateException
      A Raft leader may demote to the follower role after it appends an entry to its local Raft log, but before discovering its commit status.
      class  LaggingCommitIndexException
      Thrown when a Raft node's current commit index is smaller than the commit index specified in a RaftNode.query(Object, QueryPolicy, long) call.
      class  MismatchingRaftGroupMembersCommitIndexException
      Thrown when a membership change is triggered with an expected group members commit index that doesn't match the current group members commit index in the local state of the Raft group leader.
      class  NotLeaderException
      Thrown when an operation, query, or a membership change is triggered on a non-leader Raft node.

    • Uses of RaftException in io.microraft.impl

      Methods in io.microraft.impl that return RaftException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RaftException RaftNodeImpl.newCannotReplicateException()  
      RaftException RaftNodeImpl.newNotLeaderException()  
      Methods in io.microraft.impl with parameters of type RaftException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void RaftNodeImpl.invalidateFuturesFrom​(long startIndexInclusive, RaftException e)
      Completes futures with the given exception for indices greater than or equal to the given index.
